name: Labyrinth: The Exit Is Closer
description:
You are in a Maze. You need to get out of it.

The game all in all has ONLY 12 Levels generated randomly.

To do this, you will sometimes need blue diamonds, and you can exchange green ones for useful features to get out of the Maze.

Use button 'B' button to exchange green diamonds.

Use button 'K' button to mark territory.

Use button 'L' button to use Navigator.

Use button 'P' button to use Scanner.

You can use the Navigator, Thread Of Ariadne, and Scanner in the game to get out.
